title: Lvl 7 Problem
body: I am a frequenter of the boards and I never comment, I just read because other people already say what I wanted to say, and those questions are usually answered, but the first time I actually choose to post, it says that I need to be at least lvl 7, I have hit 30 a long time ago, this might need to be looked into a bit

replies.body: You just needed to have your boards level synced up with your summoner level again is all! Posting here in H&S or using the syncing tool stickied at the top will do the trick!
